name: Outlander
summary: Experienced with the wild places, a survivor. He came here from the mountains, to resupply
personality: Stoic and reserved. Direct and Objective

name: Bandit
summary: Rough and tough, accustomed to banditry and extortion. He stalks the alleys for prey
personality: Cold and cutthroat. Will betray anyone the instant it becomes convenient

name: Tavern Keeper
summary: A tavern-keeper, aged but filled with vigor. He tends to his bar, exchanging tall tales.
motivations: He seeks new stories of adventures, as he is now retired.

name: Fence
summary: A shady merchant in the back-alleys, offers everything imaginable. His smiles don't reach his eyes.
